channel.title: Neverwinter nights where can i download it :s
channel.description: I want to download/buy winternever nights 1 all of it. but prob is I want to be able to download it not buy from amazon and wait 5 weeks lol. I just purchased never winter nights 2 and the gameplay is pretty cool i love D & D based games. I looked at a teaser/gameplay for Never winter nights 1 and i must say I am impressed it is a old game but it is pretty sweet and you can mod it i love games you can mod (I am addicted ) lol

item.title: Neverwinter nights where can i download it :s
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“emtrescue, post:5, topic:405993”]they dont it is prety old it was one of the first 3d mmorpgs made of its style[/quote]It wasn’t an MMORPG, and it was hardly the first RPG. I’d argue that Baldur’s Gate was what got the ball rolling!

Ps you can buy Neverwinter Nights on www.gog.com for a low price.

EDIT: Specifically: http://www.gog.com/en/gamecard/neverwinter_nights_diamond_edition

Read full topic
